pullRequest.title: ISPN-11742 updating index page and integrations doc

nodes.bodyText: @tristantarrant I'm not sure about the overview and getting started docs. they seem pretty stale but might still be useful. should we keep them?

-
-See link:http://www.infinispan.org/documentation[Infinispan Documentation] home for other versions.
+We also have a link:titles/memcached/memcached.html[Memcached Client Guide].
+However, Infinispan does not recommend using Memcached for security reasons and
+the server endpoint is planned for removal. See the _Server Guide_ for details.

nodes.bodyText:
this section looks weird now. We have:
1. Integrations
1.1 Apache Lucene
2. Hibernate
3. Spring

IMO, it would be better to "promote" Apache Lucene to top-level (so it would be 1 instead of 1.1) or bring the hibernate/spring one level down (1.2 hibernate, 1.3 spring)
WDYT?
There are some "Infinispan" words in the document. should they be changed to "{brandName}"?

@@ -2,58 +2,56 @@

-Getting Started::
+Embedding Infinispan::

nodes.bodyText:
can we make this consistent? or integrations.adoc includes both "hibernate" and "spring" docs or nothing...
do you agree?
